channel.title: My runserver.bat is acting weird.!?
channel.description:
well i would run it, and it works people log on but i think its nulled, after a little it wont lag and dc people and u cant log in again?:S please help my problem[br][br][size=1]Posted on: January 07, 2009, 03:07:45 pm[/size][hr]this is what it is i beleive. :
java.net.SocketException: Connection reset at java.net.SocketInputStream.read(SocketInputStream.java:168) at client.fillInStream(client.java:7782) at client.run(client.java:16148) at java.lang.Thread.run(Thread.java:619) ClientHandler: Client null disconnected (69.2.207.7)

item.title: My runserver.bat is acting weird.!?
item.dc:creator: @iKillAssassins iKillAssassins
item.description:
@iKillAssassins wrote:

There’s some kind of problem in client.java, and you might also want to check for the SocketInputStream and Thread inside it… Check ClientHandler too.

Read full topic

item.title: My runserver.bat is acting weird.!?
item.dc:creator: @i_scary_i i scary i
item.description:
@i_scary_i wrote:

You don’t have a client.java I think… make sure you have all your server files… if not check your class path and path?

Read full topic
